text: In this article, discover how to craft custom, reusable HTML elements using Web Components and Vue.js.
Web Components enable the creation of complex, reusable HTML elements with encapsulated functionality,
boosting productivity and consistency across web platforms.
This guide will walk you through crafting these components,
including how Vue.js can be used to build efficient web components.
You'll also learn how the Vue.cli simplifies exporting Vue.components as Web Components.
